biography_text: GREEN, Mark, a Representative from Tennessee; born in Jacksonville, Duval County, Fla., November 8, 1964; graduated from Monticello High School, Monticello, Miss., 1982; B.S., United States Military Academy, West Point, N.Y., 1986; M.D., Wright State University, Dayton, Ohio, 1999; United States Army, 1987-2006; medical doctor; business executive; member of the Tennessee state senate, 2013-2019; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: United States Military Academy, West Point, N.Y.
